name: Stand Banner Guide Template (kolayetkinlik)
description:
Stand Banner Guide Template

(For Exhibitor Companies to use in online events on kolayetkinlik.com)


Using this design file;

  1. Edit your logo position for the event exhibition web page
  2. Design your stand banner for the event exhibition web page
  3. Check your banner view in the live preview frame
  4. Check the other examples of stand display



  • Logo - 1060x560 px
  • Stand 1 Banner - 1920x1080 px (Half Page Stand)
  • Stand 2 Banner - 1920x1080 px (Full Page Stand)


Photoshop Design Files and Guide Images

Download at the google drive

You may use the psd files with guides. To preview what your banner will look like when cropped, please see example images.
